string.value: Kinokonoko of the Mushroom Shrine apparently found something. I should check it out.
Kinokonoko asked me if I could solve this puzzling code. What does this code mean...?
I managed to solve the code Kinokonoko gave me--answers lie in Sleepywood.
Oh~! This is just perfect. Hey there, stranger, will you lend me a hand?
I'm sorry. I was just cleaning up, and I found this. I can read this, but I have no idea what this means...
(Received an old piece of paper from Kino Konoko. It looked quite fuzzy, but it had something written on it.)
It reads "K H E L P â–¡"... with the last letter being blank. What must that letter be...??
(It clearly reads "K H E L P" plus a blank after the P. Other than that, no signs of letters or drawings whatsoever on it.)
I can feel something unusual with that piece of paper. Can you help me solve this code?
Good luck. I'll be awaiting your word on this.
I see. I can tell you're a busy person. Oh well...!
(Based on the codes learned from Kino Konoko, I went to section 7-2, and... what the? The statue seems to have something engraved on it.)
Did you solve the code? I'll be waiting for the good news...
